comment: Not sure what's going on now (really, what isn't going on with this app is more accurate...) But recently I can't seem to upload pictures to any of my boards that have sections... Only the ones that don't. Boards without sections are fine, they'll receive pics from my photo app no problem. Seriously, if I could get rid of this app, I honestly would. 馃槕
key sentence: Unable to upload pictures to boards that have sections, while boards without sections can receive pictures from the photo app without any problem.
